  \caption{Simulation parameters used in generating Figure~\ref{fig:r2r_siso_simulation1}}
\footnotesize
\resizebox{\textwidth}{!}{
    \begin{tabular}{clc}
    \toprule
    \multicolumn{1}{c}{\parbox[t]{2.5cm}{\textbf{Simulation Parameter}}} & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Description}} & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Settings}} \\
    \midrule
    N           & number of runs & 500 \\
    d           & sampling time delay & 1 \\
    $\theta$    & the IMA(1,1) moving average coefficient  & 0.85 \\
    $\beta$     & the true process gain & 2.5 \\
    $\sigma$    & standard deviation of the white-noise in IMA(1,1) series & 0.1 \\
    b           & est process gain in process model & 2.5 \\
    $\omega$    & the forgetting factor for EWMA filter & 0.15 \\
    r           & target setpoint in deviation variable & 0 \\
    \bottomrule
